title: UPDATE
text:
NEW YORK GIANTS — Signed CB Brandon McGee from the practice squad. Waived TE Jerome Cunningham. 
HOCKEY 
CAROLINA HURRICANES — Reassigned D Brett Pesce to Charlotte (AHL). 
TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING — Reassigned D Slater Koekkoek to Syracuse (AHL). 
NOTICES 
BASKETBALL 
Mineral Ridge — will hold a basketball camp for girls in grades 4-6 through Thursday. Cost is $25. For details, contact Coach Mike DelBene at 33-540-1714 or Michael.DelBene@gmail.com . 
COACHING 
Salem High — seeks applications for head baseball and head softball coach. Contact AD Todd Huda at Hudat@salem.k 12.oh.us or 330-332-8911. 
Cardinal Mooney — seeks a varsity boys/girls bowling coach. Send resumes to athletic director Don Bucci, 2545 Erie St., Youngstown, OH 44507. For more details, call 330-788-9879. 
KICKBALL 
Creekside Golf Dome — is taking signups for its adult coed kickball league. Games are played on Wednesday nights starting in November. Call 330-545-5000. 
To submit a notice, or if you see a notice that should no longer run, please email sports@vindy.com or fax 330-747-6712. Other stories of interest
